Articles.Content:
I'm just enquiring about the Spaceport

There are so many duplicated, or more, much more of the same files.

I'm not sure if the people are uploading their bits 100 times or if its just an error in the site.

I feel it could do with a a clean out, browsing through the Spaceport has become more and more tedious over the months.

does anyone else have this problem?

There's updatespam, where people just re-upload the same file and call it an update to reappear on the front page, then there's just a huge amount of .craft files to clear them all (This was said by a spaceport mod), and on top of that, tagspam. Spaceport 2 was coming and it was the supposed end to the problem, but since n3x1s was fired nobody knows what happened with it.

No it is not update spam. The spaceport is broken. Updating and uploading sometimes fails and goes bonkers and uploads the same thing a few times. I usually go aroudn to cleaning it up, but I've been a little busy lately. I'll get around to do it asap.
